name: Dead Way
description:
Warning! Some content can be graphically disturbing for some users. You may find zombie dogs during the game. If you are sensitive we DO NOT recommend you to buy this game!

Horde Mode

In an open world you and your friends will have to fight together agaist several waves of massive zombies coming in your way, try to not die otherwise your friends will need to revive you. Find new weapons and ammunitions spread on the city. Hide, run and explore but dont get lost becouse no minimap will help you find your way back.

Multiplayer

  • Host a Game
  • Find Game
  • Friendly Fire
  • Up to 8 Players
